description: Detects a Powershell process that contains download commands in its command line string
name: PowerShell Download from URL
query: (process.executable:(*\\powershell.exe OR *\\pwsh.exe) AND process.command_line:*new\-object* AND process.command_line:*net.webclient\).* AND process.command_line:*download* AND process.command_line:(*string\(* OR *file\(*))
author: Florian Roth
oscd.community
Jonhnathan Ribeiro
